title: Suite Schema

examples: Assert the page title is present on the page.

sleep__sleep.description: A number of seconds to pause execution

value__set.description: The name of the variable to set.

set.description: The variable name to contain the last line of the BASH output.

env.description: Any number of values to be used by Cypress.env.foo

set.description: The variable name to contain the output of the PHP evaluation.
